title: Chun-Hao Yang
text:
Experiences

2023/08 - present: Assistant Professor, Institute of Statistics and Data Sciences, National Taiwan University.
2021/08 - 2023/07: Assistant Professor, Institute of Applied Mathematical Sciences, National Taiwan University.

text:
